definitions.definition: Any lipid , such as lecithin or cephalin , consisting of a diglyceride combined with a phosphate group and a simple organic molecule such as choline or ethanolamine ; they are important constituents of biological membranes .

main_definition: ( organic chemistry ) Any lipid , such as lecithin or cephalin , consisting of a diglyceride combined with a phosphate group and a simple organic molecule such as choline or ethanolamine ; they are important constituents of biological membranes .
